snippet.title: Assassin's Creed Pirates - Launch Trailer [UK]
snippet.description:
See more on www.assassinscreed.com/pirates

Become the most feared pirate of your time in this stand-alone game for smartphones and tablets! Manage your crew, upgrade your ship and engage in huge naval battles!

Download the game now on:
App Store: http://bit.ly/IRtoVg 
Google Play: http://bit.ly/1ga5xxW
